definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: She had her handbag robbed in the daytime.
sentences.chinese: 她的手提包在大白天裏給人搶去了。

sentences.english: Then she reached into her handbag and took out her ATM card.
sentences.chinese: 然後她伸手到她手提包裏拿出她的銀行卡。

sentences.english: Khaki tote bags and metallic suede clutch bags appeal to you, since you want your accessories to be as eclectic as you are.
sentences.chinese: 卡其布或金屬的小山羊皮裁製手提包都很襯你哦。

sentences.english: You hear constant calls from street corner vendors ("Handbag?
sentences.chinese: 你能聽到街邊的小販商叫賣“要手提包嗎？
一隻麼有帶子的手提包。

sentences.english: She always keeps a powder compact in her bag.
sentences.chinese: 她的手提包裏總放着粉盒。

sentences.english: She opened her handbag and began to repair her face.
sentences.chinese: 她打開手提包，開始往臉上重敷脂粉。

sentences.english: She foraged about in her handbag, but couldnt find her keys.
sentences.chinese: 她翻遍了手提包，就是找不到鑰匙。

sentences.english: A mob of women laid into him with handbags and pointed shoes.
sentences.chinese: 一幫女人用手提包砸他，用鞋尖踢他。

sentences.english: Hobo style shoulder bag made of leather.
sentences.chinese: 皮革手提包風格單肩包。

sentences.english: A woman carries a handbag on her shoulder in this undated photo.
sentences.chinese: 這張未標日期的照片顯示的是一位女性背著手提包。
我更喜歡紅色的手提包。

sentences.english: Phila of cachous, kissing comfits, in her satchel.
sentences.chinese: 她的手提包裏裝著口香片，接吻時喫的糖果。

sentences.english: I take several plastic bins, in which I place my handbag and tote bag.
sentences.chinese: 我拿起幾個塑料盒子，將手提包和挎包放入盒內。

definition: bag or purse etc/small bump or pimple/hillock
